name: Realtime dashboard
shortDescription: Template of how to build realtime dashboard with Dash.

Variables.Name: input
Variables.Description: Name of the input topic to listen to.

Variables.Name: output
Variables.Description: Name of the output topic to write to.

Variables.Name: storage_version
Variables.Description: Version of state. Bump up this variable to reset the state.

Variables.Name: parameters
Variables.Description: The streams parameter list to calculate the view on.

Variables.Name: group_by
Variables.Description: Name of the tag to group data with.
